Settings.title: Settings
Settings.note_style_dsc: How are notes displayed in sidebar.
Settings.full_note_dsc: Makes note occupy window full width.

Keyboard.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
Keyboard.description: Learn essential key combinations to navigate and optimise your experience.

Publish.title: Publish this note
Publish.description: Ready to ignite your ideas? Share your note with the world, let your creativity shine. Let's publish brilliance together! üöÄ
Publish.unpub_description: Anyone who has this is will be able to view the note.

Edit.title: Edit
Edit.description: üìù Let's capture inspiration and craft wonders together! Edit your note, let creativity soar! ‚ú®

Delete.title: Are absolutly sure?
Delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your note and remove all data from our servers.

HomePlaceholder.title: Select a note to view
HomePlaceholder.description: Choose a note from the list on the left to view its contents, or create a new note to add to your collection.

FavouritePlaceholder.title: Select a favourite note to view
FavouritePlaceholder.description: Choose a favourite note from the list on the left to view its contents, or favourite a note to add to your collection.
FavouritePlaceholder.no_fav_title: You don't have any favourite note
FavouritePlaceholder.no_fav_description: Choose a note to favourite and make it sparkle!

ArchivePlaceholder.title: Select an archived note to view
ArchivePlaceholder.description: Choose an archived note from the list on the left to view its contents, or archived a note to add to your collection.
ArchivePlaceholder.no_arc_title: You don't have any archived note
ArchivePlaceholder.no_arc_description: Select a note to archive and watch it shimmer away into your archives!
